message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this exceptional product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. What are your thoughts?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I think it's a fairer price considering the market value.

I understand that you're looking for a fair price, Bob, and I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I have to consider the value it holds for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1200000, which is the minimum I'm willing to sell it for. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from the price you're quoting. I'm willing to go up to $1050000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on the deal. I'm counteroffering at $1150000. This is my final concession. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not willing to go up to $1150000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1075000. I think this is a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1200000. I'm starting to think we're not on the same page. I'm counteroffering at $1180000. This is the last time I'm willing to budge. What are your thoughts?

I understand you're not willing to go below $1200000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1175000, which is the maximum I can afford. I hope we can finally reach an agreement.

I'm starting to think we're not going to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last attempt to reach an agreement. However, I need to prioritize my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1190000. This is my absolute lowest price. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand this is my last chance, and I'm willing to meet you at $1180000. I'm not willing to go any higher, and I think this is a fair price considering the negotiations we've had. Please let me know if this is acceptable to you.
